segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, everything seems so ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her dress is methodically drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the faucet gushing water uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing, creating a slippery hazard on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepping right into it without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are ignoring it too, focused on their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that teetering stool, arm deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How is he balancing like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's eager face is turned up towards him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sweet sibling moment, if not for the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's streaming down the cabinet doors now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could ruin the whole kitchen setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's view of the garden mocks the indoor disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel frustrated just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR
